Parameters: boolean: The default is true. If you specify false, you must either provide a non-null and non-empty array to @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput#Builder#setChoices_E@, or enable a data result in setAllowDataType. Otherwise an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ is thrown.
setAllowFreeFormInput(boolean).Description: Specifies whether the user can provide arbitrary text values.

addExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Merge additional metadata into this builder. Values within the Bundle will replace existing extras values in this Builder.

Parameters: String: A mime type that results are allowed to come in. Be aware that text results (see @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput#Builder#setAllowFreeFormInput_E@ are allowed by default. If you do not want text results you will have to pass false to setAllowFreeFormInput.
boolean: Whether the mime type should be allowed or not.
setAllowDataType(java.lang.String, boole.Description: Specifies whether the user can provide arbitrary values.

Parameters: CharSequence: The label to show to users when they input a response.
setLabel(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set a label to be displayed to the user when collecting this input.
